## StraightSegment.boxIntersection() method

Calculates all intersections of the given box with this segment. By default this method simply calls `lineIntersection` with each of the four faces of the box; subclasses can override this if they think there's a faster way to compute the entire box at once.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
boxIntersection(x: number, y: number, w: number, h: number): Array<PointXY>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | X position of top left corner of box |
|  y | number | Y position of top left corner of box |
|  w | number | width of box |
|  h | number | height of box |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;PointXY&gt;
